data.title: Warner Bros. Movies Index
data.meta_description: Warner Bros. movies by letter and by year
data.text:
The table below lists the top-grossing Warner Bros. movie released in each calendar year (based on worldwide box office). Click on the year number for a list of all the Warner Bros. films released that year. The "Annual Stats" links will take you to a summary of the domestic film business for Warner Bros. movies for the year in question (this part of our archive starts in 1995). Click on the movie name to see information on the individual film.

The table below shows the highest-grossing Warner Bros. movie that begins with each letter of the alphabet. Click on the name of the film to go to its page. Or click on the letter at the beginning of each row for a list of all the Warner Bros. movies beginning with that letter.
